title: february 18: a planet or not
description:
Today on the pod, Maia talks about the discovery of Pluto, and its later demotion from planet to dwarf planet. Then she talks about the breakout hit of one of our favorite pop stars. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
